summary: Mission v9.2.7 - INTERRUPTEURS MINIMALISTES & FIX PARCOURS - All features verified. API platform-settings GET/PUT working for Super Admin. Quick Control UI with toggles implemented in CoachDashboard.js. CoachVitrine shows photo+name in header top right. BecomeCoachPage redirects to #partner-dashboard after free pack. 7 Bassi reservations confirmed.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ v9.2.7 server.py lines 5966-6034: /api/platform-settings GET/PUT routes - CORRECT implementation
✅ v9.2.7 CoachDashboard.js lines 344-390: Quick Control state and refs properly initialized
✅ v9.2.7 CoachDashboard.js lines 3875-3970: Quick Control UI with 3-dot icon and toggle menu
✅ v9.2.7 CoachVitrine.js lines 348-368: Photo and name in header top right - IMPLEMENTED
✅ v9.2.7 BecomeCoachPage.js lines 101-106: Free pack redirect to #partner-dashboard - IMPLEMENTED
✅ API /api/platform-settings returns correct settings with Super Admin detection
✅ API /api/reservations returns 7 reservations for Bassi (Super Admin)
✅ API /api/coach/vitrine/bassi returns coach profile with correct data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.2.7 verified successfully. Key verifications: (1) API /api/platform-settings GET returns partner_access_enabled and maintenance_mode with is_super_admin flag. (2) API /api/platform-settings PUT updates toggles for Super Admin only (403 for others). (3) Quick Control UI implemented in CoachDashboard.js with 3-dot icon showing toggles for 'Accès Partenaires' and 'Mode Maintenance'. (4) CoachVitrine.js shows coach photo (logo_url or initial) and name in header top right. (5) BecomeCoachPage.js redirects to #partner-dashboard after free pack registration. (6) 7 Bassi reservations confirmed via API. (7) Homepage loads 4 March dates (04.03, 11.03, 18.03, 25.03) at 18:30.

verified_features_v927.PLATFORM_SETTINGS_PUT_API_SUPERADMIN: VERIFIED - Toggles work for Super Admin

verified_features_v927.QUICK_CONTROL_UI_MENU: VERIFIED - Dropdown with Accès Partenaires and Mode Maintenance toggles
verified_features_v927.COACH_VITRINE_PHOTO_NAME: VERIFIED - Photo and name displayed in header top right
verified_features_v927.BASSI_7_RESERVATIONS: VERIFIED - 7 reservations returned for Super Admin
verified_features_v927.PARTNER_DASHBOARD_HASH: VERIFIED - Opens Connexion Partenaire modal with Google login
